mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TAB_STANDARD_RANGE (guid, rangeName, rangeCode, rangeType) VALUES(#{guid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rangeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rangeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rangeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE TAB_STANDARD_RANGE
rangeName = #{rangeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rangeCode = #{rangeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rangeType = #{rangeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE guid = #{guid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TAB_STANDARD_RANGE WHERE guid = #{guid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
